name: Monster Brewery
description:
Monster Brewery is a potion brewing puzzle game where you have experiment with a combination of potions to find all the monsters for your monster book. We went for the "Spooky modifier". This was for UAT's Game Jam Fall 2022

Contributors:

Programmer: Alec Carter

Designer: Ben Mallonee

Artist: Garrett Young

Artist: Jozlyn Nowak

Artist: Novali Mason

Sound: Randy Ollmann

Designer: Paul Brookins
